about.details:
Incorporated in 2001, Sona Hi Sona Jewellers (Gujarat) Limited is engaged in the trading business of jewellery & ornaments. The company operates from Millenium Plaza, Vastrapur, Ahmedabad, which is a well-known market for Jewellery and bullion. Sona Hi Sona Jewellers has three brands, namely, Freya, Jinash and Sona Hi Sona. The company operates primarily in Freya and Jinash brand name. Under the Freya brand, the company deals in antique Jewellery & ornaments. Jinash brand of the company is known for American Diamond (AD) Jewellery. The company designs the jewellery and get the job-work finished either in-house or from outside (3rd party). The product catalogue of the company includes Gold Jewellery studded with or without stones. It also includes variety in Gold Jewellery to match regional tastes. The company also offers customization options to design Jewellery as per customer needs. Besides, the in-house brand Jewellery, Sona Hi Sona is also engaged in the wholesale trading business of other branded Jewellery.

Competitive Strengths

1. Wide Experience to meet the customer's requirements 2. Add new designs to portfolio regularly 3. The wide Jewellery product range 4. Branded Jewellery and ornaments

faqs.question: What is the Sona Hi Sona IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sona Hi Sona IPO is a SME IPO of 4500000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.50 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹10 per share. The minimum order quantity is 10000.

The IPO opens on September 30, 2019, and closes on October 4, 2019.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sona Hi Sona IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sona Hi Sona IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sona Hi Sona IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sona Hi Sona IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sona Hi Sona IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sona Hi Sona IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sona Hi Sona IPO opens on September 30, 2019 and closes on October 4, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sona Hi Sona IPO?
faqs.answer: Sona Hi Sona IPO lot size is 10000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,00,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sona Hi Sona IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sona Hi Sona IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sona Hi Sona IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sona Hi Sona IPO will be done on Thursday, October 10, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, October 14, 2019. Check the Sona Hi Sona IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sona Hi Sona IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sona Hi Sona IPO listing date is on Tuesday, October 15, 2019.
